landscaping.label: Landscaping & Lawn Care
landscaping.homeDescription: Professional residential and commercial landscaping, lawn care, and outdoor maintenance services. Quality workmanship, competitive pricing, and guaranteed satisfaction.

roofing.label: Roofing Services
roofing.homeDescription: Expert residential and commercial roof repair, replacement, and inspections. Licensed, insured, and trusted by homeowners and businesses.

plumbing.label: Plumbing Services
plumbing.homeDescription: Professional plumbing services for residential and commercial properties. Emergency repairs, installations, and maintenance. Available 24/7.

hvac.label: HVAC Services
hvac.homeDescription: Complete heating, ventilation, and air conditioning services. Installation, repair, and maintenance for residential and commercial properties.

pressure-washing.label: Pressure Washing Services
pressure-washing.homeDescription: Professional pressure washing and exterior cleaning services. Driveways, siding, decks, and commercial properties. Free estimates.

electrical.label: Electrical Services
electrical.homeDescription: Licensed electricians providing residential and commercial electrical services. Safe, reliable, and code-compliant installations and repairs.
